title: France Plunges Deeper Into Crisis After Emmanuel Macron's Premier Ousted
content: French President Emmanuel Macron is looking for a new prime minister after the far right joined forces with the left to push through a no-confidence motion against his government over a budget dispute.

title: South Korea Police Investigate President Amid Impeachment Call: 10 Points

title: Amazon Sued Over Slow Deliveries To Low-Income Areas In US
content: The attorney general of the US District of Columbia sued Amazon, accusing it of violating consumer protection laws by making slower deliveries to Prime members in historically lower-income neighbourhoods.

title: Raw Milk Recall In California Expands After Bird Flu Virus Detection
content: Public health officials in the western US state of California said they have secured a broad, voluntary recall of all raw milk and cream products from a local dairy farm due to possible bird flu contamination.

title: Deadly Game: US Woman Jailed After Boyfriend Dies In Hide-And-Seek Game

title: Intel Stands By Forecast After CEO Exit, Vows To Be Thriftier

title: France's Government Ousted In No-Confidence Vote. What Happens Next?
